name: Arthiefactor
description:
During a peace time in 2020 some rebellious terrorist are using some kind of artifact to wreck havoc across the country. Their purpose is to collect all artifact of indonesian to build, a gigantic weapons platform with worldwide nuclear strike capabilities.

With the safety of the entire world at stake, at the request of the special forces, summoned X out of retirement for one last solo operation to stop them.

Control
WASD : Move
Space : Dash/Attack
E : Use Items

Our Teams

-Designer-
